findings.message: Reservoir.drip() (../..0x2775b1c75658be0f640272ccb8c72ac986009e38.sol#45-66) ignores return value by token_.transfer(target_,toDrip_) (../..0x2775b1c75658be0f640272ccb8c72ac986009e38.sol#63)
findings.name: unchecked-transfer

findings.message:
Reservoir.mul(uint256,uint256,string) (../..0x2775b1c75658be0f640272ccb8c72ac986009e38.sol#82-89) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool,string)(c / a == b,errorMessage) (../..0x2775b1c75658be0f640272ccb8c72ac986009e38.sol#87)
findings.name: incorrect-equality

findings.message:
Reservoir.constructor(uint256,EIP20Interface,address).target_ (../..0x2775b1c75658be0f640272ccb8c72ac986009e38.sol#32) lacks a zero-check on :
		- target = target_ (../..0x2775b1c75658be0f640272ccb8c72ac986009e38.sol#36)
findings.name: missing-zero-check

findings.message:
drip() should be declared external:
	- Reservoir.drip() (../..0x2775b1c75658be0f640272ccb8c72ac986009e38.sol#45-66)
findings.name: external-function
